mapper.update:
UPDATE u_company
company_name = #{companyName},
user_id= #{userId},
user_name = #{userName},
status = #{status},
company_celebrate_time = #{companyCelebrateTime},
company_mail_suffix = #{companyMailSuffix},
registration_status = #{registrationStatus},
company_content = #{companyContent},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
backgrond_img = #{backgrondImg},
company_logo = #{companyLogo},
is_test = #{isTest},
company_type = #{companyType},
company_linkable_id = #{companyLinkableId},
platform_linkable_id = #{platformLinkableId},
secret = #{secret},
WHERE id = #{id}
